name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A delicious beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, and special sauce, served on a sesame seed bun.

name: Bacon Avocado Burger
description: Our signature burger featuring crispy bacon, creamy avocado, lettuce, tomato, red onion, and tangy BBQ sauce, served on a brioche bun.

name: Loaded Nachos
description: A generous portion of crispy tortilla chips smothered in melted cheese, topped with seasoned ground beef, jalapenos, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Tender chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

name: Philly Cheesesteak
description: Thinly sliced steak grilled with onions, peppers, and melted cheese, served on a toasted hoagie roll.

name: Grilled Chicken Club
description: Grilled chicken breast topped with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise, served on toasted whole wheat bread.

name: Cobb Salad
description: A refreshing salad featuring mixed greens, grilled chicken breast, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, bacon, tomatoes, and blue cheese crumbles, served with choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with garlic croutons, shaved Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet seasoned with herbs and grilled to perfection, served with steamed vegetables and choice of side.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti marinara.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Spaghetti pasta tossed in a creamy sauce made with eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce made with butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, and fresh basil leaves.
